app.name: TousAntiCovid
onboarding.welcomeController.title: Welcome
onboarding.welcomeController.mainMessage: Receive alerts and alert others about exposures to COVID-19
Use TousAntiCovid to help fight the pandemic by reducing transmission risks.
onboarding.explanationsController.title: It‚Äôs easy!
onboarding.explanationsController.stepFo: TousAntiCovid uses your phone‚Äôs Bluetooth connection to detect other users‚Äô phones that are close to yours.
onboarding.explanationsController.stepIn: You will be alerted if you have been in close contact with a user who has tested positive for COVID-19.
onboarding.explanationsController.stepBe: Protect my loved ones and everybody else

If you have been diagnosed with COVID-19, the positive test results will come with a code to be scanned or entered manually or your doctor will give you the code. This code will let you send anonymous alerts to users who have been in contact with you.
onboarding.privacyController.title: Confidentiality
onboarding.proximityController.title: Detection
onboarding.proximityController.mainMessa:
TousAntiCovid needs to use your phone‚Äôs Bluetooth connection in order to work.
No location data are shared or recorded.
onboarding.beAwareController.title: Notifications
onboarding.beAwareController.mainMessage: Receive push notification if you have been exposed

You will be alerted if you have been in close contact with a reported COVID-19 case.

TousAntiCovid will then give you the recommendations from the Ministry for Solidarity and Health.
onboarding.gesturesController.title: Don‚Äôt forget!
onboarding.gesturesController.gesture2: Cough or sneeze into you elbow or into a tissue
onboarding.gesturesController.gesture3: Use single-use tissues and throw them in the bin
onboarding.gesturesController.gesture4: Avoid shaking hands, hugs and kisses
onboarding.batteryController.title: Battery use
onboarding.batteryController.mainMessage: TousAntiCovid needs to run as a background app.
To enable TousAntiCovid to run as a background app, deactivate battery optimisation for TousAntiCovid only.
sickController.message.testedPositive.ti: Have you been diagnosed with COVID-19?
sickController.message.testedPositive.su: You have received a code with your test results or been given a code by your doctor: please scan or enter the code so that the users you have met can be alerted.
sickController.message.youHaveSymptoms.s:
Do you want to know what to do?
This questionnaire can guide you.
sickController.message.cured.title: If you are not ill
sickController.message.cured.subtitle: Your COVID-19 test is negative. Report it with the button below:
sickController.state.nothing.title: You have not been exposed to any user who has been diagnosed with COVID-19
sickController.state.nothing.subtitle: You still have to remember the barrier gestures and public health recommendations
sickController.state.contact.title: In the last few days, you have been exposed to one or more users diagnosed with COVID-19 and you are now a high-risk potential contact
sickController.state.contact.subtitle: Tell your doctor that you have been alerted as a high-risk potential contact and self-isolate.
Are you sure you want to delete the notification?
sharingController.title: Share
sharingController.mainMessage.title: The more of us who use TousAntiCovid, the better we are protected
sharingController.mainMessage.subtitle: We need you. The impact that this app has on fighting COVID-19 depends on you! Please share it with your friends and family.
sharingController.appSharingMessage: I‚Äôm using TousAntiCovid to fight the pandemic. To send and receive alerts, you should install the app too: https://bonjour.tousanticovid.gouv.fr/
aboutController.title: About
aboutController.mainMessage.title: About TousAntiCovid
aboutController.mainMessage.subtitle:
This app was developed by the TousAntiCovid team under the supervision of the Ministry for Solidarity and Health and the Ministry of State for Digital Affairs.
TousAntiCovid team: Inria, ANSSI, Capgemini, Dassault Syst√®mes, Inserm, Lunabee Studio, Ministry for Solidarity and Health, Orange, Sant√© Publique France and Withings.

informationController.title: Information
informationController.subtitle: Ministry for Solidarity and Health
informationController.mainMessage.atRisk: You have been exposed to a user diagnosed with COVID-19
informationController.mainMessage.nothin: You have not been exposed to a user diagnosed with COVID-19
informationController.step.isolate.atRis: Please restrict your contacts to the fewest people possible. Be very diligent about strict compliance with barrier gestures.
informationController.step.isolate.nothi: Please comply with the barrier gestures to slow the propagation of the virus
informationController.step.beCareful.atR: If you have any doubts, complete the guidance questionnaire at Mes Conseils Covid or call your doctor.
informationController.step.beCareful.not: If you have any doubts, see your doctor if you think you have symptoms. And complete the guidance questionnaire at Mes Conseils Covid.
informationController.step.appointment.s: Call your doctor. If you do not have a doctor, call the number below to find a doctor (free service, toll free call)
informationController.step.moreInfo.subt: For personalized recommendations about your health and that of your loved ones.
enterCodeController.title: Your code
enterCodeController.mainMessage.title: Please enter the code you have received with your test results (under the QR code) or from your doctor (6-character code valid for 1 hour).
enterCodeController.mainMessage.subtitle: This code is randomly assigned and does not contain any personal information.
enterCodeController.noCodeEnteredAlert.m: You need to enter the code before continuing
scanCodeController.explanation: Point your phone at the QR code printed on your test results (this code is anonymous and does not contain any personal information)
common.error.callImpossible: You cannot call from this phone

common.needLocalisationAccessToScan: The app needs to access the location of this phone to scan phones nearby.
common.error: There are a lot of you!
common.error.internet: Check your internet connection and try again
common.error.server: A lot of people have joined TousAntiCovid. Thank you! We're doing our utmost to be back online very soon.
common.error.needRegister: You need to register to do this

accessibility.hint.onboarding.back.label: Go back
accessibility.hint.proximity.alert.touch: Use this button to go to settings
accessibility.hint.sick.qrCode.enterCode: This requires the use of the camera. You can use the next button to enter the code manually

notification.proximityServiceRunning.mes: Thank you for being a part of the fight against the spread of COVID-19!
notification.channel.title: TousAntiCovid is activated
notification.channel.atRisk.title: Risk of exposure to COVID-19
notification.atRisk.title: Risk of exposure to a person with COVID-19
notification.atRisk.message: In the last few days, you have been exposed to a user who has been diagnosed with COVID-19. If you are a minor, talk to your parents or your guardians. Tap here to find out what to do.
manageDataController.title: Settings
manageDataController.eraseLocalHistory.s: This will delete all of the information about "Bluetooth contacts " collected and stored on your phone.
manageDataController.eraseLocalHistory.c: Are you sure that you want to delete the entire history of "Bluetooth contacts" collected up until now? This action cannot be undone.
This will delete all of your own pseudonyms that have been shared with other phones and uploaded to the server.
This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete your temporary pseudonyms from the server?
manageDataController.eraseRemoteAlert.su: Whenever you have close contacts with users who have been diagnosed with COVID-19 you receive alerts. Attention, this action will delete all of the alerts.
manageDataController.eraseRemoteAlert.co: This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete your alerts?
manageDataController.quitStopCovid.title: Quit TousAntiCovid
manageDataController.quitStopCovid.subti: You can stop using TousAntiCovid and delete all of your personal information at any time.
manageDataController.quitStopCovid.succe: All of your information has been deleted
manageDataController.quitStopCovid.confi: This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to quit TousAntiCovid?
symptomsOriginController.title: Symptoms
symptomsOriginController.explanation.tit: Please specify when your symptoms first appeared
symptomsOriginController.explanation.sub: This will help evaluate how long you are contagious
sendHistoryController.title: Send history
sendHistoryController.mainMessage.title: Save lives by joining the citizens‚Äô fight against COVID-19
sendHistoryController.mainMessage.subtit:
Anonymously sharing your "Bluetooth contacts" helps break the transmission chains and save lives.

By sending this information, I authorise TousAntiCovid to store it on the server for 14 days.
sendHistoryController.dontSend.alert.mes: Your choice is final. Are you sure that you don‚Äôt want to send your " Bluetooth contacts"?
callCenterController.title: Call centres
callCenterController.header.title: In an emergency
callCenterController.header.subtitle: Dial 15
onboarding.proximityController.allowProx: Attention, Android will ask you for access to this phone‚Äôs location. TousAntiCovid will only use Bluetooth detection of nearby phones, and never location data
onboarding.gesturesController.gesture6: Keep a distance of at least one metre from others
scanCodeController.camera.authorizationN: You have refused permission to use the camera. You need to give permission in your iPhone settings in order to scan a QR code.
notification.channel.error.title: Error
notification.error.title: TousAntiCovid needs you
notification.error.message: Please restart TousAntiCovid as soon as possible to ensure it works properly. Thank you!
sickController.sick.title: Thank you
sickController.sick.mainMessage.title: Take good care of yourself!
sickController.sick.mainMessage.subtitle:
Here are the health recommendations.

Call your doctor if you have any doubts about the progress of the disease. If you do not have a doctor, call the number below to find a doctor (free service, toll free call).

 If you are having trouble breathing, call 15 immediately (or 114 for the hearing impaired).
enterCodeController.alert.invalidCode.me: The code entered is not valid. Please try again.
The code entered is not valid. Please try again.
onboarding.noBleController.title: Incompatible phone
onboarding.noBleController.mainMessage.t: TousAntiCovid cannot run on your phone, because it does not support Bluetooth Low Energy
onboarding.noBleController.mainMessage.s:
But you can still help fight COVID-19 by sharing this app. The more people use it, the more effective it is.
Talk to your friends and family!

notification.error.connectivity: TousAntiCovid has stopped due a lack of Bluetooth connectivity. Remember to reactivate TousAntiCovid once Bluetooth is available again.
TousAntiCovid is not activated for now, we recommend to activate it before meeting with other people. And thank you for being a part of the fight against the spread of COVID-19!

infoCenterController.title: News
declareController.title: Report test result
declareController.notRegistered.mainMess: If you have been diagnosed with COVID-19, it is pointless to report it in TousAntiCovid with your code, since you never activated the application.
myHealthController.title: My health
myHealthController.notRegistered.mainMes: You have to activate TousAntiCovid first
To be alerted about a contamination risk, you have to activate TousAntiCovid in the "Protect" tab.
myHealthController.covidAdvices.title: My COVID recommendations
myHealthController.covidAdvices.subtitle: Find personalized advice about prevention and care at the "Mes Conseils Covid" website. "Mes Conseils Covid" is a service of the Ministry for Solidarity and Health.
myHealthController.testingSites.title: Testing locations
myHealthController.testingSites.subtitle: Check Sant√©.fr to find testing locations.
myHealthController.yourDepartment.title: Your department of France
myHealthController.yourDepartment.subtit: You can check the status of the COVID-19 pandemic in your department of France.
myHealthController.notification.title: Risk alert
myHealthController.notification.subtitle:
You will be alerted if you have been in close contact with a user who is reported with a COVID-19 diagnosis (exposure at less than one metre lasting 15 minutes or more). Your status is checked every 24h.

TousAntiCovid will then give you the recommendations from the Ministry for Solidarity and Health.
infoCenterController.noInternet.title: Problem with internet
infoCenterController.noInternet.subtitle: To get the latest news, you need an internet connection.
widget.noStatus.info: Your status will be displayed here (updated once a day)
info.notification.newsAvailable.title: News, facts and figures
info.notification.newsAvailable.body: TousAntiCovid provides news, facts and figures about COVID-19, check it out now!
notification.channel.news.title: News
proximityController.error.batchLocalisat: With your smartphone and this version of Android, deactivating Android location data may disrupt the Bluetooth connection used by TousAntiCovid.
home.activationExplanation: Activating TousAntiCovid keeps you informed and informs others about the risk of contamination, and actively contributes to fighting COVID-19.
home.infoSection.title: News
home.declareSection.title: Report test result
home.declareSection.cellTitle: Have you been diagnosed with COVID-19?
home.sharingSection.title: Share test result
home.sharingSection.cellTitle: The more of us use it, the better protected we are
home.moreSection.title: More
home.healthSection.title: My health
keyfigure.registered.label: Net registrations
keyfigure.registered.description: Number of users who have downloaded and activated the app since 2 June 2020.
keyfigure.notification.label: Alerted by the app
keyfigure.notification.description: Number of people alerted by the app about exposures to COVID-19 since 2 June 2020.
keyfigure.qrcodes.label: Reported COVID-19 cases
keyfigure.qrcodes.description: Number of people with COVID-19 reported by the app using the QR code printed on the test results
keyfigure.reffectif.label: Effective R
keyfigure.reffectif.description: The virus reproduction number: this is the average number of people a person with COVID-19 can infect. This regularly updated indicator measures the intensity with which the virus is circulating. If R is greater than 1, the pandemic is spreading; if R is smaller than 1, the pandemic is shrinking.
keyfigure.tauxincidence.label: Incidence rate
keyfigure.tauxincidence.description: The incidence rate refers to the number of people testing positive for SARS-CoV-2 in proportion to the population. The rate is expressed per 100,000 population and can be used to compare different places.
keyfigure.tauxpositivite.label: Positivity rate
keyfigure.tauxpositivite.description: The positivity rate is the number of people testing positive in proportion to the total number of people tested over a given period.
keyfigure.tauxoccupation.label: Occupancy rate
keyfigure.tauxoccupation.description: This is the proportion of total initial ICU bed capacity occupied by COVID-19 patients, meaning capacity before hospitals increased their ICU beds. This indicator measures strain on hospitals' ICUs.
keyfigure.nombrecas.label: New cases
keyfigure.nombrecas.description: This number is that of new cases confirmed by a positive test over the last 24 hours. The numbers are often lower over weekends because of less testing.
keyFiguresController.title: Key figures
home.infoSection.newPostalCode.subtitle: You can obtain the key data for a D√©partement by entering the postal code.
home.infoSection.newPostalCode.alert.sub: Enter a postal code to filter the key data for a D√©partement. The postal code is stored only in the app on your phone.
onboarding.gesturesController.gesture8: Limit your social contacts (no more than 6)
onboarding.gesturesController.gesture9: Air out rooms for ten minutes three times a day
manageDataController.showInfoNotificatio: Receive notifications for news and new data.
onboarding.runWithoutBleController.title: Incompatible phone
onboarding.runWithoutBleController.mainM: TousAntiCovid will not be able to detect your "Bluetooth contacts"
Unfortunately, your phone is not fully compatible with Bluetooth Low Energy, which is used to detect your "Bluetooth contacts". However, you can still access the other functions of the app.
declareController.codeNotReceived.button: I have not received the code
Check your e-mail and your snail mail. If you don't have it, you can also ask your doctor or the health professional who tested you to give you a six-digit code.

attestation.form.achats.longLabel: Going out to buy work supplies, basic necessities from authorised outlets (see list at gouvernement.fr) and home deliveries

attestation.form.sport_animaux.longLabel: Short outings limited to one hour per day within one kilometre of home for individual physical exercise, excluding all collective sports and any proximity to other people. This means walking or running alone or with members of the same household only, or walking pets.
attestation.form.missions.longLabel: Going out to take part in public interest activities at the request of an administrative authority
attestation.form.enfants.longLabel: Fetching children from school and after-school activities
attestationsController.title: Certificates
The manager of the "TousAntiCovid" app does not process any of the information entered into the certificate generator.
newAttestationController.title: New certificate
newAttestationController.footer:
You can save this information on your phone for your next certificate. Your personal data is stored only on the phone used to generate the certificate, in accordance with the general measures required to cope with the COVID-19 pandemic as part of the health state of emergency.
- Persons wishing to claim one of these exemptions must carry a document whenever they go out that shows that their reason for going out qualifies for one of the exemptions.
- For the use of self-employed workers who cannot obtain a certificate from an employer.
- Including free supplies (food banks, etc.) and going out to collect social benefits or make cash withdrawals.
manageDataController.attestationsData.su: This will delete all of the data on your phone relating to your exemption certificates, including saved certificates and data.
manageDataController.attestationsData.co: Are you sure you want to delete all of the data related to your exemption certificates? This action cannot be undone.
attestationsController.menu.delete.alert: Are you sure you want to delete this exemption certificate?
I hereby certify that my reason for going out is one of the authorised reasons under the terms of the general measures required to cope with the COVID-19 pandemic as part of the health state of emergency.
newAttestationController.missingInfo.ale: All fields must be completed to generate a certificate.
attestationController.footer: You can also use the Ministry of the Interior website to generate a PDF version of the certificate:
attestationsController.expiredSection.su: These exemption certificates will be deleted from your phone automatically.
An error occurred when generating the certificate
